SUB_W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
My, that's an odd smell we have wafting
about here! Although I suppose it's no more
than a difference in atmospheric composition
for you, eh, my dear?

SUB_W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
Constantine
SUB_W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you inferring that from some sort of data?
Brilliant, if so! Ah, but this is a most important
world, so I encourage you to explore it most
thoroughly.

SUB_W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Aye, I'll ensure my search covers
the entirety of the world.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Another accident? Well, great. I suppose this
is going to postpone the beginning of service
yet again. What is our useless pack of engineers
even doing!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You there! What are you staring into
space for? Hurry up and deal with this!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I'll see it taken care of, Director.
I've already called Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
There's going to be no end to trouble if you
don't sort this out, Fred. Dealing with the
Anti-Triangle is already enough of a headache—
we don't need more issues in our lives.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And remember this: the Trigon Corporation
has no seats at the table for those who prove
themselves of no use.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sorry about that, friend. The director's been
on edge lately, what with the accidents at
the triangle engines and the appearance
of the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: Sorry, but I'm not following ye.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ah, I see. You've clearly come to
us from somewhere far away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well then, let me give you the rundown.
Every single machine we have is powered
by something called a 'triangle engine.' These engines are based on a concept
called 'triangle theory,' and require
no fuel of any kind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text: But even without fuel, ye must rely on some manner of energy source.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Moving on, the term 'Anti-Triangle'
is a general word we use to describe the
monsters that have started to crop up
of late near our triangle engines. Our current working theory is that these monsters
are attracted to the force fields that surround
the engines, but honestly, the phenomenon isn't
particularly well understood yet.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
A relationship could be hypothesized
between this Anti-Triangle and the energy
source used by your triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
A fascinating theory! Are you a scholar?
I'm sure she'd be interested to—

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
I hear we had another accident
with the triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Oh, Corana! Great. Now that you're here,
I'll let you sort the situation out.
Work with this mech here to repair the
triangle engines, please and thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
All right. Come on, you—we'll start by
making some emergency repairs to the
central terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Emergency repairs are finished.
Things should function without
issue once more after we restore
the entire triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
As the new model of triangle engine
is rather lacking in countermeasures,
sudden loads tend to cause accidents. Also, I've yelled at the Trigon board about
this until I'm blue in the face, but do
they listen to me? Nooo!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Beg pardon, but do ye know if I was
created by the Trigon Corporation?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
What in the name of all that
is holy are you talking about? Ugh. Well, either way, I know it does no good
to complain to you. But the director never
listens to a word I say, telling Fred is pointless,
and you happen to be standing here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
There is no time for idle chatter.
We must proceed to the next location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. We'll head to the
triangle engine at the tower at once.
Come along, you!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Is that fiend one of the
Anti-Triangle ye spoke of?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You don't know about the Anti-Triangle?
Are you a new hire or something?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I've no memory of being affiliated with
the Trigon Corporation in any way,
but your director seems convinced
that I'm employed by ye somehow.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
What? Oh wow, sorry about that; I thought
you were a Trigon Corporation employee.
Fred must've mistaken you for one
and told you to come with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Nae, Fred knew I came
from a place far away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Anti-Triangle! We have to
deal with them quickly!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.text:
System reinitialization is complete,
and the restart process is underway.
We should return to normal output shortly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Did the fiends damage the
triangle engine, then?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.text:
The Anti-Triangle doesn't attack the triangle
engines—it just steals energy from them.
But eventually it steals so much that
the engines overload and shut down.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Usually I can't count on a word Fred says,
but it looks like he wasn't wrong about my
bringing you along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Since all the other triangle engines are
currently in shutdown mode, I need to
go around and restart them all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.text:
I'd normally have to wait until Trigon sent out
a special team to deal with the Anti-Triangle,
but with you and Master at my side, we should
be able to proceed without issue.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Not to interrupt, love, but I'm currently
searching for my heart. Do ye happen to
know anything about that?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_070.text:
So you're saying you can't help me
because you have to find...a heart?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Nae, I'll do anything I can to assist!
I just believe my heart might be found
somewhere along the line as I do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Okay, well, I'll gladly take the help.
And in return, I will do what I can
to help you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.text:
A fine plan. Now let us head to the next site;
as soon as we have three repaired engines,
we can link them into a more efficient
tandem known as a 'triangle network.'

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Along with the terminal and tower,
one other location going back online
will let us form a proper triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There's supposed to be a triangle engine
about, but I cannae see one anywhere.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
There is not, at least according to the
data I have on hand. That said, the place
is indeed part of the triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Welcome to Mural Ruins. I'm Barbara,
and I conduct research on the murals here.
I heard we had some unusual guests coming,
but didn't know Dr. Sitrix had an assistant!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm Diva, and I'm working with Master
to repair the triangle engines. Might
ye tell me more about these ruins?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
This is the place where Alessa and Corana—
the Sitrix sisters—invented triangle theory.
Supposedly they were inspired by the murals,
but that could just be a myth.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Regardless, I'm hoping to unravel the true
meaning behind the murals by investigating
the various pieces that remain here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I would also like to see the mural
that Dr. Corana Sitrix saw.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I was created by Dr. Alessa Sitrix based
upon the principles of triangle theory.
I know nothing of the time prior to my
initial origination.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh dear. You see, that mural is located
deep inside the cave, and I am not sure
I can actually guide you there. You'll probably want to consult with Corana;
it's a complicated route, but I'm sure BX10
won't have any trouble recalling it once
she implants it in his memory.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_100.text: Well, love? Ready to crack on?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I wish to see the place where triangle theory
was born. The reason behind this is something
more akin to human sentimentality than logic,
but either way, I feel the need to go there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.text: Right then. Let's speak to Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
We heard the mural that helped ye discover
triangle theory is inside the mural ruins.
Would ye please tell us how to find it?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
There are more than a few factual inaccuracies
there, but I'll let that go for now. More to the
point, however, you can't visit the mural.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
It turned into the Vermillion Bird and flew away.
That event was the impetus for our research into
triangle theory, which posits that arrays of
triangles can produce energy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
I exist because doctors Corana and Alessa Sitrix
went into that cave, and would like to see it for
myself so I might decide whether or not it is a
truly special place.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Aye, such a special place may hold
clues to my own heart, as well.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Very well. In that case, I will record
the location data in Master's memory
so he can guide you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text: Aye. Cheers for the tip, love!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text: Do you mind if I come along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Not at all. Just take care not
to get lost along the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Dearie me, it's just as she said:
the mural is gone.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Wait, it's gone!? Why didn't you say that
BEFORE we tromped all the way here!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Oh, but look! There's a triangle-
shaped indentation here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Ah, yes. I also see a triangular
fragment on the ground.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text: Let's put it in the indentation.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text: I detect a faint trace of energy!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Oh, but this raises so many questions!
Did this occur naturally, or did ancient
people already know about triangle theory!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So even this dam uses a
triangle engine, then?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The dam's hydraulic power generation
is used to make the triangle engine
more efficient. It is one of Dr. Alessa Sitrix's earliest
works—such a large-scale apparatus
would not be made today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
A'yup. And since it's so old,
maintenance is a real pain.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
While the procedure to restart this engine
is not complicated, it takes a good deal of
time due to the size of the dam. As such,
I recommend we prioritize other locations.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Actually, I can handle it if you give me
the details. I mean, it IS my job as the
foreman of the dam and all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Very well. Remember these steps.
First, you...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
...And if you repeat that sequence,
everything should work out.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Woof! That's a lot more work than I
was expecting. But I'll get 'er done,
don't you worry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Took a while, but I finally managed
to get everything restarted.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Thanks for showing me how, by the way!
Probably a good thing for me to know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
People keep saying things are being
purified, but the pollution around here
is clearly getting WORSE, not better.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I mean, these people are all
off their nuts, right!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Exactly—and that's why we need
to ACTUALLY purify things!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
So you're on their side,
tree-hater!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.text:
With that man gone,
we can restart the engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Today we're gonna do some
REAL purification!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_030.text: Nae, leave me out of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Goodness, but that's an unusual fashion sense
you're sporting! Got time to chat? I'd love
to pick your brain and see if it can maybe
lead to developing some new products.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Me? Are ye certain? I cannae recommend
turning to one such as myself for an
assessment of aesthetic sensibilities.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, pishposh! Now tell me, what is it
that you desire most right now?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
That's easy: my heart. But as this is a fashion
discussion, I'll tailor my answer toward that.
Perhaps a wristwatch, then? I think one with
a unisex design would be magic.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Does the Trigon Corporation even have the
technology to develop a triangle engine
small enough to be worn on the wrist?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Don't underestimate us! Why, your circuits
would be scrambled if you saw what was
going on at the company's R&D facility!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, but I do like the sound of an
R&D facility. Might it be possible
to arrange a tour?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
It's already finished? That's amazing!
Sadly, this is far too large to be practical.
For common use, it must be two centimeters
smaller and a full 450 grams lighter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
Director! I'm working on a prototype that
utilizes a small-scale triangle engine,
but it appears it's still too large.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
The miniaturized triangle engine is a nut
countless individuals before you have
tried and failed to crack.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
We need more practical product concepts.
Try asking for Fred's opinion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Say there, Fred! So I'm trying to develop a
wristwatch that utilizes a miniature triangle
engine, but I just can't seem to get the thing
small enough. Do you have any ideas?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Miniaturizing a triangle engine is something
best left to pure geniuses like Alessa.
Sadly, she was never interested in that
kind of research.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Agreed. Dr. Alessa Sitrix's research interests
shifted away from improving the triangle engine
itself and toward the development of the
BX series—which concluded with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
She doesn't much care about machines.
In the end, Alessa thinks about Alessa,
and that's it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
You and Alessa have a close 
relationship, then?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, sorry. Did it sound like that?
No, I'm afraid Alessa has passed on.
I was speaking of things in the past.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, and this is merely a thought,
but what if you pursued an air purifier
instead of this wristwatch?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
The technological capabilities of the Trigon
Corporation allow us to manufacture large-
scale products with ease, you see. And if we develop products that are meant
for factories and not individuals, we can
sell them at an even higher price.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Ah, I see! So rather than trying to force the
miniaturization work, I should make use of our
existing technology on products that need it!
I think I've seen the light as an engineer.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Great. Then go work hard so you
can earn the director's approval.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
Thanks to you, we sold
a ton of air purifiers!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
And by installing them in this area,
the triangle network has been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Residential and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears the triangle network repairs
are proceeding smoothly. Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The emergence of the Anti-Triangle...
The severing of the triangle network...
The failure of triangle engines... My sister and I battled these problems
since we first came up with triangle
theory, but its value to the world
has been worth any amount of pain. Or at least, that is very much
what I want to believe...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.text:
You're looking a bit peely-wally there, love.
Perhaps you might take a wee rest and ask
your sister to help?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.text:
...Alessa passed away in an accident
some ten years ago.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.text: Oh, so sorry to hear it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.text:
There's no need to apologize; honestly,
I still have a hard time believing it.
I keep thinking she'll show up one day—
she did always love her little pranks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.text:
It doesn't help that the details of her
accident are maddeningly unclear. In fact,
the only witness was Fred, who was her
assistant at the time. Alessa's old laboratory is still in the
basement of the terminal, but not even
I am allowed in there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.text: What manner of person is Fred?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You'd have to ask him about that.
For now, you can leave the triangle
engine in this place to me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Corana, are ye angry? I'm sorry if I
said something that wasn't my place.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.text:
It's not that. Fred and I were once...
Well, we were an item. So if I seem
reluctant to discuss the man, that's why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Ye were Alessa's assistant, were ye
not, Fred? What kind of research
was she conducting?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I was her assistant when she was researching
the BX series—the results of which are
standing next to you now. We wanted to apply triangle theory to AI.
Alessa had grown dissatisfied researching
triangle engines, you see, and sought to
use the theory with different applications.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Honestly, Alessa was just quick to lose interest
in things. Once a subject started going well,
she'd drop it like a hot potato and move on to
something new and exciting. Gave me a bit of whiplash as her assistant,
but that was nothing compared to the messes
her sister Corana had to clean up.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
That has nothing to do with you.
Why are you even asking?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Aye, I suppose you're right. I'm sorry.
I simply heard ye were the only eyewitness
to the incident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Ugh. This conversation is dredging up some
things I would much sooner forget. She was
so horribly disfigured in that accident,
and I just... I can't...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I'm sorry, but my inability to handle this
is why I broke up with Corana, and I really
have no interest in discussing it further.
I'll take my leave now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
We obtained no new data
on the accident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
So long as the cause and details of the
accident remain unknown, Dr. Alessa Sitrix's
death cannot be confirmed conclusively. My analysis of our conversation just now
also supports that assessment.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
There's another thing I dinnae understand:
why did Alessa's accident lead to the
dissolution of Fred and Corana's partnership?
I cannae see how the two are linked.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Even a logical engineer like Dr. Corana
Sitrix can sometimes act in ways counter
to logic. That's simply how humans are.
I call it a function of their hearts.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I've finished repairing the laboratory's
triangle engine. Now tell me, how did
your conversation with Fred go?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
We asked about Alessa's accident,
but he told us nothing new.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Boy, does that sound familiar. Honestly, I felt that way even when we lived
together. Though we were partners, I never
once felt love for the man. It was more like...
Well, like I had to comfort him in Alessa's stead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_03.text: Had Alessa asked ye to do so?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
...Forgive me. It's water under the bridge.
There are things that need doing in the here
and now, and that's what I should attend to.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.text:
The triangle network restoration seems
to be proceeding apace; the skies look
that much prettier.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm unfamiliar with such emotional or
intuitive things, but my analysis of
the smoke from triangle engines makes
me wonder how safe it is for humans.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.text:
You're an odd one, aren't you? This smoke
is proof that life is growing richer!
Also, when I look at a sky and see only
blue, it makes me profoundly uneasy. Just look at all that smog! Doesn't it make you
feel like you're being embraced by something warm
and comforting? In this way, our engines give
not only physical happiness, but peace of mind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Sadly, peace of mind is beyond me.
Also, I should probably mention that
I witnessed the Anti-Triangle failing
to absorb energy from a triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That seems rather unlikely, but I suppose
I've no choice but to believe you.
Can you give any more details?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_050.text:
Nae, I dinnae notice anything especially
unusual about the Anti-Triangle itself.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, what about the area around it?
If the Anti-Triangle itself hasn't changed,
perhaps something in the surroundings did.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The triangle network around the
Anti-Triangle had been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Aye. The Anti-Triangle struggled and
failed to absorb energy from the engine,
then disappeared entirely in short order.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Interesting... So if the Anti-Triangle is
caught in a triangle network, it protects
the engines and gives us an opening to
exterminate the beasts.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Then we should restart triangle engines
in a way that encloses the Anti-Triangle
in the resultant triangle networks.
I'll get this sorted right away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Exactly so. Oh, but this is very exciting!
Now that we understand more about the
Anti-Triangle, we might be able to prevent
it from appearing entirely.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
We'd like to take a look at
the triangle engine here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Get outta here! If I can't use any water
from the dam, I can't get any work done!
Now go on! Beat it! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Seems like my son's good work has led to the
restoration of the dam's triangle engine.
What a chip off the old block! Gah ha ha!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.text:
We'd like to take a look at
the triangle engine here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Nope! I'm busy gettin' the thing up
and running again. Go on, now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Why won't this man listen to us?
He should be concerned about the fact
his engine is no longer functioning.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.text:
I seem to have offended that poor man.
Perhaps his son might know more.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Beg pardon, love, but is your father 
the man who runs the mine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Oh no! Is he causing you trouble?
I'm so sorry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Nae, it's fine! We'd just want to look at
the mine's triangle engine, but he chased 
us out. I fear I may have said something
to which he took offense.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
*sigh* I'm afraid he's always been like this.
See, my father is an incredibly competitive
man who always tries to do everything himself. This leads to a vicious cycle where it
becomes harder and harder to ask for help
once he realizes he's in over his head.
But yeah, I think I can smooth things over.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text: I'll head over there right now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: I'm busy with work! Go on now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Son! What brings you here?
That dam still purrin' right along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
It's running great, but only because these
folks helped me repair the triangle engine—
and you should let them do the same here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Help!? I don't need no gosh-durned help!
Ain't nobody know this mine better'n me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
YOU might be fine with that, but what about all
the other people working here? If the triangle
engine isn't fixed soon, they won't be able
to support their families.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: Okay, fine. What if I help you instead of some stranger?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, sure! I'd never turn down
help from m'own son.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
A'yup, I think we're ready to get things
up and running here. The process is the
same as it was at the dam, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.text:
Yes, that will work fine. The engine here
is of the same antiquated construction as
the one located at the dam.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.text:
An amusement park. What a grand
use for the triangle engines!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Indeed. Dr. Corana Sitrix is always saying
that we must also use the power of triangle
engines to make the children happy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Pure dead magic, it is!
...Er, except for that?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Help! Heeelp! The triangle engine
is out of control and we can't shut
down any of the rides!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The wee ones are in danger! Master,
what do ye do when a triangle engine
runs out of control!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.text:
This is the first time something of this
nature has happened, and my database files
do not possess a clear solution. We might be able to stop it by absorbing the
triangle energy and inducing an overload on
the system, but with the triangle network
severed, we have no means to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.text: Oh, but I have an idea.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.text:
We'll lure the Anti-Triangle here
and have THEM absorb the energy!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Our Anti-Triangle strategy worked!
I'm so relieved the wee ones are safe.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will forward this data to Dr. Corana Sitrix.
The information regarding both the park's engine
running wild and its subsequent stabilization
should prove valuable research data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh wow, you know Dr. Sitrix? When I was a kid,
she gave me a toy that was powered by triangle
energy. That's actually the whole reason I
started working here in the first place!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix's dream is blossoming
splendidly. She really should have more
confidence in what she's doing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aye, technology can bring people
happiness—but what even IS that?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It is good to see you again, Michele.
Would you mind if I took care of
restarting the triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Michele

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Michele here was one of Dr. Corana Sitrix's
colleagues at the laboratory—and the one she
had the greatest number of conversations with.
Clearly she was enamored with him.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
More than friends but less
than lovers, then.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My analysis judged you to be the most
suitable partner for Dr. Corana Sitrix.
Why did you not act on this?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Because Corana was too busy hooking up
with Fred, of all people. Why she did that
I'll never know, especially considering he
and Alessa were an item!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.text: Er... Right. Sorry. Back to work.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You should go say hello to Dr. Corana Sitrix
once in a while, Michele; while I can help her
with this kind of work, what she truly needs
is a partner with whom she can share her life.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I want to, Master—I really do.
I just... Well, I can't.
Call it a human failing, I guess.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You're as handy as ever, Master!
We got that wrapped up in no time. I'm also really glad we got to catch up.
Er, and if you don't mind, would you
tell Corana that I'm doing all right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.text: I will be certain to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I think we just got a glimpse into Michele's
heart, and it only solidified how complicated
humans really are. Does that mean finding
my own heart will make ME more human?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The animals have escaped!
Please help me get them back!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I will take care of repairing the
triangle engine if you can help
this woman with the animals.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_SEARCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_SEARCH_000_CUT_0.text:
I found an animal.
Bringing it home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
You took enough time that I was
able to finish the repairs here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text: So sorry I kept ye waiting.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sure wish we could use triangle theory
to create a breed of animal that actually
LISTENS when you call them...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix feels it unethical to apply
triangle theory to living creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
It may soon be possible to create life
programmed to think for itself. If so,
what would be the difference between
a machine and an animal?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text: Well, anyway, sorry about all that.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hello. I'd like to have a look
at the triangle engine here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but there's a customer in the building
that houses the triangle engine, so you can't
go near it right now. They're demanding that we purge the
pollution as quickly as possible—and
between you and me, I hope it happens
soon, because they are VERY annoying.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
They're even saying that the end of days is
approaching because we aren't handling the
pollution correctly. Talk about a buzzkill!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Given this information, we should
deal with other locations first.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Hello. I'd like to have a look
at the triangle engine here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Oh, are you here to repair it!?
Thank the stars!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
People keep contacting us with
all these wild complaints,
and I'm just at my wits' end!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text: I will deal with it at once.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello! I'm with the Trigon Sales Department!
Would you like to try out one of our newest
products absolutely free of charge!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Great! First of all, this is a sensor that
utilizes triangle energy to locate
places that will boost your spirit.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Even the end of days is nothing to
worry about when you have this baby!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much for your interest!
Aaand...here you go. I went ahead and
just turned it on for you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, I hate it when people turn down
a good deal... But hey, your loss!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.text:
Do machines even have
a spirit to be boosted?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_010_CUT_0.text:
I'm getting a response
from my sensors!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text:
My sensors are not picking up
anything at this location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text: Oh, but mine are! Fiends ahead!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
We encountered fiends at all
three locations we visited.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, and you're SO
much stronger now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
I suppose that would be the
spirit boost ye mentioned?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Did ye truly anticipate this outcome?
Because if so, Trigon Corporation and
its employees are simply brilliant!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Uh... Yeaaaaaah! We sure did!
Thanks for your help!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Residential Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
We've already repaired this engine,
so restarting it is a simple matter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
He appears to be headed to the basement
level of the terminal. Perhaps he is going
to the laboratory of Dr. Alessa Sitrix
that her sister mentioned.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
The one she claims to have never seen?
Let's go take a look.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
...Yes, everything is proceeding apace.
Additionally, the one we spoke of before
is proving to be quite useful.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, he's speaking to someone.
And am I 'the one' he mentioned?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
There's a 50 percent probability
that the person he is speaking
to is Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text: I cannae see who it is from here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
As I said, there is only a 50 percent
probability. This is, however, an
assumption based on my analytics.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Fred seems cautious of his surroundings;
I doubt he wants anyone to see him here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
If he was indeed speaking to Alessa,
there should be no reason to hide that.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Aye, I agree—but we've no proof
it WAS Alessa, now, do we?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I think we should share this
information with Dr. Corana Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
A 50 percent probability isn't enough to
do that, love. Let's talk to Fred first.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is in the central
terminal. I do not know why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Do ye always have Corana's
location data available?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I am Dr. Corana Sitrix's assistant;
I must always be aware of her actions.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
And ye are unaware of
Alessa's location data?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Correct. My last reading that seemingly
detected her was our first contact since
the accident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text: Shame it can't be so easy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
It's true that I lack the data to infer the truth
of the situation. However, if Dr. Corana Sitrix
has discovered something in the terminal,
we may be able to supplement said data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Aye, it's entirely possible Corana
is meeting with someone.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
You must let me see Alessa's laboratory,
Fred; I have to know if there are any
papers on triangle theory there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This again, Corana? All remaining data has
been released to the public through the
Trigon Corporation. There's nothing there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
But you of all people know how she was:
there might be notes or writings or
seemingly random doodles that could
turn out to be a breakthrough! Other people would simply overlook
that kind of thing, but I won't.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Look, I know I've always come across as a kind
of idiot luddite to you genius Sitrix sisters,
but Alessa's lab is owned by the Trigon
Corporation, and I'm in charge of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
So no, Corana. You can't go in.
Now turn around and go home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Ugh. One of these days, she's just going to
force her way in even if it means destroying
the entrance. We really need to deal with this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This exchange has happened many times
between the two of them, and this
instance provided no new information.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I'm a wee bit curious about the
last thing Fred said, though.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
It would seem he has some plan
we are not aware of.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Something is going on here:
the terminal's energy level is rising.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
I calculate a 50 percent
chance that it's Fred.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
We should determine if
it is Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
So the traveler of the Conjoined Worlds has
been lured in at last. I have been trying to
ascertain if you would be a friend or foe,
but see now that you are clearly the latter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
You'll rue the day you
interfered with me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
That woman sent the Anti-Triangle to
interfere with the triangle network—
and I believe she was Alessa.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text: It was her, but it also was not.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
50 percent of the woman is Dr. Alessa Sitrix,
but the remaining 50 percent is something else.
I am not surprised you did not notice this,
because you never saw her before the accident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
We should inform Corana
about what we've seen.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
While this is indeed new information regarding
Dr. Alessa Sitrix, my calculations say we should
not convey it to Dr. Corana Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh. It's you two. Look, I know there's been
a lot of work recently, what with all the
various problems cropping up, but please
continue the repairs as fast as you can.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: We should head to the Central Terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: It's been a long time, Master.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Alessa, did ye create the Anti-Triangle and
have it interfere with the triangle network?
And if so, why would ye do such a thing?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
You think you know much, traveler,
but you know nothing. The Anti-Triangle is a natural formation
caused by triangle energy. I was merely using
them to make the true dangers of the triangle
network known to Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
This is the first I've
heard of such dangers.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Oh, triangle theory itself is perfectly safe.
Unexpected things happen, however, when
energy is amplified through a triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Not even I can predict what may happen next.
All I can tell you right now is that the world is
in grave danger.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
All of the triangle engines
have been repaired.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is headed for the central
terminal, where it appears they are planning
to hold a ceremony.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aye, and energy levels are
spiking in the area.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I noted this as well. Something unusual is
happening: Dr. Corana Sitrix is in danger.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
We'd best get a wiggle on
and let her know!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What is this ceremony then, love?
A celebration for repairing all
the triangle engines, perhaps?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The director of the Trigon Corporation
informed me about an important ceremony
I had to attend. That's all I know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen! Today is a
momentous day in our history: every triangle
engine is now functioning, which means the
triangle network is complete! Yes, this is a day of new beginnings—
not only for all of you, but also for
everyone who could not be with us today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Now, let us beckon the Supreme Being unto us.
I daresay none among you will be unfamiliar
with her name...Doctor Alessa Sitrix!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Greetings, everyone. Let me begin with this:
I'm aware that many of you believed I was
killed in a tragic accident—and in reality,
that is not far from the truth. But thanks to the energy generated
by the triangle network, I have
been able to return to this world.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Henceforth, I will be resuming the work that
was interrupted by my accident—the work of
applying triangle theory to living creatures. I will offer up my body as a test subject
once more. But this time, we have more than
sufficient amounts of triangle energy,
which means I cannot fail.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
In a moment, I will stand upon this stage as a
new form of life: the Supreme Being. And once
this is done, all of you will be transmuted
into triangle energy and become one with me. Please know it will be the great honor
of my life to guide you all in this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Have you gone utterly mad, Alessa!?
That's not what triangle theory is for! What about all the times we talked about
using it to help people!? To be of service
so they could live happier lives!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you and I not completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today. But this is a happy moment, Corana!
You are about to become a part of
the Supreme Being—a part of ME.
Does this not fill you with joy?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I sadly dinnae follow any of that.
What is this joy ye speak of?
Do ye consider it joy to die?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All that the Trigon Corporation does
is for the sake of the great Alessa—
and we offer our all unto her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.text:
And ye as well, Fred? Did ye have me
repair the triangle engines in pursuit
of this manner of joy, then?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.text:
All is as Alessa foresaw, for she said
you would be the last piece of the puzzle. Oh yes! She is my goddess, and I seek
nothing more in this life than to be
of service to her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.text:
I saw how you were guided by the green light,
traveler, and knew it would lead you here.
Thus was I assured of my destiny, for your
arrival is the key to advancing these events.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I came here in search of my heart,
and cannae become a part of you. Corana, is there a way to sever the
triangle network? ...Corana? Love?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I wish we never saw the Vermillion Bird mural...
I wish we hadn't researched triangle theory...
I wish I'd gone on that date with Michele... I wish I'd never reached out to Fred...
I wish I had never been Alessa's sister...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Nae, Corana! I need your strength now
if I'm to find my heart! Please help me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Master, please contact all the people we
met at the various triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Understood. I will open a line
to all of them simultaneously.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Brilliant. Once that's done, ye and Corana
focus on cutting off the triangle network
while I get this fiend sorted!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.text:
How can you just move forward
like this!? I just... I...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Am I moving forward, though? I've no idea how to
best search for my heart—it's as though everything
is shrouded in smoke. But if ye believe I am,
I'm going to put my all into doing my best.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
We had a dream when we saw the Vermillion
Bird, Corana... And though it didn't come
true today, maybe someday...it...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_000.text:
What will ye do about
the triangle network?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.text:
I've decided to divide the network
into smaller clusters. While this will prevent triangle energy from
becoming too concentrated in one place,
each cluster will also serve to complement
the others and help keep everything in check.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Making improvements based on data from
this incident, then. But without triangle
energy, ye won't ever see Alessa again.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I am a scientist.
I prioritize data over emotion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Aye, some people are like that.
Ye'd have my full support, love.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.text: Let me help you, Corana. Please.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Michele? Of course you can help!
And, um... Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.text:
Have you found the heart
you were searching for?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.text:
I don't know. But when I look at Corana
and the others, I feel as though there's
something inside them I don't possess.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_100.text:
You're an odd one, searching for something
nebulous like a heart despite being a machine.
But your words are persuasive regardless,
so I will choose to believe you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_110.text:
After accessing the triangle network,
I learned ye call this world Vermiglio.
What does that word mean, exactly?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.text:
We don't know what it means.
That's just what it's called.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.text:
This is a ceremony for you, Dr. Sitrix,
so I hope you enjoy yourself. That said,
why are you mingling with one of our
employees? Looking for a new assistant?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_030.text:
It appears the director's
misunderstanding persists.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Now then, Dr. Alessa Sitrix will be arriving
momentarily, and I suspect it will be a moving
reunion of sisters long-parted. As such, I'll
give you a little time to say your goodbyes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you not gone and completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.text:
I don't understand. Are you...Alessa?
I mean, I'm happy you're alive—truly I am—
but I'm also very confused. What's going on,
and what did she mean by 'saying goodbyes'?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.text:
I fear your sister's role ends here.
With the triangle network completed,
I need her to die for real this time.
...Fred? If you would?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.text:
Fred, no! The director betrayed me!
She intends to keep all this power
for herself! Get rid of her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, now THIS is rich! Two beautiful—yet
utterly terrifying—women have made the
same request of me! Must be my punishment
for being so darned handsome.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, Corana, my former flame. Though you're
rather plain, you're smart as a whip—so I trust
you to make a cool-headed choice here. Who should I choose: the director
or your sister? Who dies?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.text: Don't even joke about that, Fred!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Ah ah ah! I know what you're trying to say.
Or rather, I knew what you were going to say
without you even saying it. Alessa may have foisted cleaning up
her research onto me, but she IS
your only sister, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Which makes it an obvious choice.
Sorry, Director—I guess you die.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.text:
You damn, useless drunk! Apparently you
didn't believe me when I said there was
no seat at the table for those who
weren't of use! But so be it. If you can't deal with
Alessa, I'll just do it myself.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.text:
Hey, you're the one who handed out the
death sentence. And on that note... Bye!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.text:
Well, would you look at that?
I'm the director of Trigon now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.text:
The director is dead, but the plan moves on.
Concentrate the energy from the triangle
network into the central terminal, Fred.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.text:
That's 'Director,' not 'Fred.' Also,
you don't order me around anymore,
Alessa. The director decides what we're
doing here—and oh gosh, that's ME!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.text:
Your eternal life project has, of course,
been canceled. Instead, we'll make a charm
filled with triangle energy and sell it to
customers who crave perpetual youth. And of course, it'll make me RICH!
RICH, I tell ya!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.text: I knew you were useless as an assistant, but I never realized you were so stupid.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.text:
Well, well! Looks like this day just
earned itself another death sentence! Still, just murdering you outright would be
so BORING, so perhaps I'll try to extract
a little triangle energy out of it!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.text:
Dear me, I wonder how long you'll be able to
maintain that form? I mean, you SHOULD show
your sister how brutally disfigured you were 
after the failed experiment, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.text:
You used triangle theory to evolve yourself
once you saw the success of the BX series.
Sadly, living creatures aren't machines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.text:
Living creatures ARE different from machines!
Even if repaired, they cannae go back to how
they once were—so ye must stop this, Fred!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.text:
Are you still here? Look, just hurry up,
do whatever it is you came here for,
and then be on your way. Oh, and I have a VERY fun date planned
with the Sitrix sisters here, so I'd
advise you not to get in the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_300.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_300.text:
The energy level around Fred
is rising quick as anything!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_330.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_330.text:
I cannae come all this way, see this,
and pretend none of it ever happened!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_340.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_340.text:
A wise choice.
Oh, and take BX10 with you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_370.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_370.text:
...Is that would you thought I'd say?
Ah ha ha! You fell for my stalling technique!
Much like Alessa, I have evolved—and now
my triangle energy is at its full potential!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Energy levels have returned to normal.
I don't recommend trying one's hand at
technology if ye lack the knowledge.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I was...drunk? Yes, that's it!
Just a little drunken prank!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.text:
And your being blootered has caused
the death of the director!

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.text:
Alessa, why didn't you tell me you were alive?
I don't care what you look like, because you'll
ALWAYS be my sister. So let's try to find a way
to get you back to normal—together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.text:
You don't have to console me, Corana.
Triangle theory isn't magic—that which has
been broken can't be put back how it was.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.text:
But there MUST be a way, Alessa.
Don't give up—we'll find it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I always did tend to give up on things...
But all right, Corana. If you think this
can be done, I'll follow your lead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.text:
This is the first time you've taken my advice since we
went to the cave mural! I wish you'd tried listening to
me a lot earlier, but I suppose this will have to do.
Let's see the Vermillion Bird together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.text:
The greatest sisters in the land
are back in action once more.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.text:
I don't know. But when I look at Corana
and the others, I feel as though there's
something inside them I don't possess.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, if it isn't Dr. Sitrix and
our otherworldly traveler! Sorry I confused you for an employee before, but
I'm SO impressed by how helpful you've been since
you came here—we were at quite the loss for how
to deal with Alessa's Anti-Triangle creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_030.text: Wait, Alessa's Anti-Triangle? What does that mean?

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, I suppose it won't hurt to reveal
my entire clever plan now that the
triangle network is complete...

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The Trigon Corporation was created to raise the
funds required to complete the triangle network—
and I cannot tell you how proud I was when
Alessa selected me to lead her new company.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.text:
But as we approached our goal, Alessa suddenly
wanted to stop the project. Of course, that
would have caused Trigon to collapse—and as
its director, I could not permit such a thing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Hold on. Alessa died in an accident
shortly after the project started.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh no, Alessa is very much alive;
her 'death' was something she
and Fred came up with. Don't get me wrong—there WAS an accident.
But it didn't kill Alessa.
It just...changed her.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Details, details! Look, I'm not an expert
in triangle theory, so if you want any
actual technical answers, you'll need to
go straight to your sister. All I know is this: Alessa wanted to complete
the triangle network in order to get her
original body back, and Trigon was happy
to help her achieve that goal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.text:
And then? Poof! Her sudden change of heart.
But I don't need to tell YOU about that;
I'm sure you've found yourself tossed about
on the stormy seas of her whims before. Regardless, it was too much to ask—the
livelihoods of Trigon's entire staff
hung in the balance, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.text:
